inclusion.criterion: Obese pregnant women with BMI > 30 kg/m2
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: BMI was 24 at the first visit when she was at 6 weeks of gestational age

inclusion.criterion: First prenatal visit or subsequent visit prior to 20 weeks of gestation
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Willingness to participate in the study and give informed consent
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Pre-existing DM or pre-gestational diabetes mellitus,
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Gestational age more than 20 weeks at time of enrollment
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Unknown or inability to determine gestational age even with last menstrual period
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Previous medical history of gestational diabetes mellitus.
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has no specific past medical issues and only uses prenatal vitamins.
